bibl.title: The Pleasures of Epigram: "New" and "Old" Posidippus.
bibl.note: Review article of: Benjamin ACOSTA-HUGHES, Elizabeth KOSMETATOU and Manuel BAUMBACH (Edd.), Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309) = Hellenic Studies. 2 (Washington, D.C. - Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2004). - Pp. 262-263: Appendix 1: Repetition, "New" and "Old"; - 264-265: Appendix 2: Pressed into Service: Epigrams in "Narrative" Sequence; - 265-268: Appendix 3: The "State of the Art".
bibl.seg: NISETICH Frank, The Pleasures of Epigram: "New" and "Old" Posidippus.
